mapper.insert: insert into product(place_code, product_name, product_img, product_price, product_explanation) values (#{place_code},#{product_name},#{product_img},#{product_price},#{product_explanation})
mapper.select: select i.product_code, i.place_code, i.product_name, i.product_img, i.product_price, i.product_explanation, p.place_logo, p.place_name, p.place_code from product i, place p where p.place_code = i.place_code and product_code = #{product_code}
select * from product order by product_code desc
select count(*) from product where place_code = (select place_code from place where member_code = #{member_code})
